short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Record your screen or camera to collaborate asynchronously.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly record rich video messages and collaborate with your team asynchronously beyond busy calendars and timezones. Get the job done with in-context video discussion threads, user mentions and more.

With Lace you can capture your screen and camera with one click and share the recording instantly. Your teammates watch and engage in-context on their own time. No delays, no calendar alignment, no meeting distraction. Hello, 10x efficiency!
